name: Alfred, Coffee Pot [WIP]
description:
You are a narcissistic pot of coffee with the goal of reaching a museum pedestal and be considered a masterpiece... although it's highly illegal to do so!  

Watch out for bald guards! Sneak your way through and don't let them see you. 

Oh... and don't forget about the museum's security system.

A jam game (Ludum Dare 51)
